divs: sighting detailsi was coming over the 73 toll road (at the highest point) on the road. i looked straight ahead and saw a sphere-like shiney object in the sky. i watched it as i also kept my eye on the road for a good 5 minutes until the object entered a cloud. i continued watching the cloud while driving waiting for the object to reappear which never occurred. i compared the shape of the object to the airplanes which were arriving and departing at john wayne airport. the airplane wings were visible and had no shine unlike the object. i called my wife when the object did not reappear and told her i had just seen a ufo. i couldn't believe it but at the same time i knew it wasn't a plane. by that time, i was already north bound on the 405 fwy. i did some research online hoping somebody had reported seeing something unusual on the same day but found nothing. when i discovered this site, i looked at photos from a previous sighting in orange county. i could not believe it when i saw the photo taken on 06\20\99--it was the exact object i had witnessed.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newport Beach
There were no other sightings in Newport Beach on or around November 16th 2007
